com.brightcove.player.media.tasks
Class FindMediaTask

java.lang.Object
  android.os.AsyncTask<java.net.URI,java.lang.Void,org.json.JSONObject>
      com.brightcove.player.media.tasks.FindMediaTask
Direct Known Subclasses:
FindPlaylistTask, FindVideoTask
public class FindMediaTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.net.URI,java.lang.Void,org.json.JSONObject>

FindMediaTask is a base Task that others in this package should extend. This, and other tasks are intended to be executed by FutureTask in an eventHandler in MediaService. All tasks should make calls to the BC api using the HttpService from within their Overridden 'call' method, then fire an event (e.g. "found:video" or "found:playlist") to alert the original emitter that the job is complete.

doInBackground

protected org.json.JSONObject doInBackground(java.net.URI... params)
Performs the HTTP network request on a background thread. Posts the JSONObject that was parsed from the response body to the AsyncTask.onPostExecute(Object) method.

Specified by:
doInBackground in class android.os.AsyncTask<java.net.URI,java.lang.Void,org.json.JSONObject>
Parameters:
params - a single URI argument must be provided to issue the request
Returns:
the parsed JSONObject, or null if the response body could not be parse or there was a network error

buildURI

public java.net.URI buildURI(java.lang.String command,
                             java.lang.String idField,
                             java.lang.String id)
                      throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                             java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
Builds a URL to make a query to the Brightcove API. The nature of the query is determined by the command field. Note that this method relies on VideoFields.DEFAULT_FIELDS;

Parameters:
command - The BC command parameter, e.g. "find_video_by_id"
idField - The field that represents the id, .e.g "video_id"
id - The id of the object
Throws:
java.net.URISyntaxException
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
See Also:
VideoFields.DEFAULT_FIELDS
